column5: We would like to know how your trip to the Dr. went yesterday.  Did that pike break your finger er wha?  Inquiring minds need to know.
Bump.  I always have to do all the work around here.

Doug,   Thank you for your concern.  I went to emergency to have my finger taken care of.  I don't have much time to respond (and only one hand typing)  Here is a pic of my finger (there is a link because of the graphic nature)  I'll keep you up to date.  Thank you Doug and all Ofners!  Here is the pic (not for kids!)  click here: My Webpage
LOL.... I was afraid to look, and I was right to be.  Pike, broke yer finger? Musta been big?
Oh ya,  Just look at him.  A real hog.
After seeing that picture, it seems it was much worse than originally thought!!!!!  I hope you get well soon!!!! LOL
You want to keep an eye on that, so it doesn't get worse...  lol  Mike
Every time I look at it, it makes me sick.
I've been putting off clicking on that link, Grant.  I wish now I'd delayed it indefinitely.
It looks like inflammation and infection has set in to me. I strongly recommend an intramuscular injection of 2 million units of Gentamyacin administered to the Gluteus Maximus!... ya nuckin' fut!
